page.title: 04Clubs & Societies:Chinnor et
page.content: Clubs in the Chinnor area There is a Sports and Social Club in Chinnor where footballl and tennis are played; three adult football clubs and one boys' club thrive. The R.A.O.B.( Buffaloes) meets in an inn as do a Jazz Appreciation Society, a C.B.Radio Club, a Rifle Club and a Judo Club. The large teenage population is catered for by one Youth Club. An Historical Society exists, also a Peace Group. There are also a Ladies Keep Fit Club and three Playgroups. The two primary schools provide many after-school activities for the children and Mill Lane School also has a Community Hall, used for badminton, table tennis and a Computer Club. St Andrews School hosts Adult Education activities which flourish. W.I.s exist at Chinnor and Sydenham.
